content:
Fun in the Sun


Picture yourself on a tropical adventure to the relaxing, rejuvenating Florida Keys.  The Marker offers a warm and inviting destination you may never want to leave.  But when you're not sipping poolside cocktails, working up a sweat in our onsite fitness center or surfing the waves of high speed Wi-Fi from the comfort of oversized guest rooms, you'll find you're within easy reach of all the island excitement Key West has to offer.

Nearby Activities

  • Waverunner tours
  • Parasail rides
  • Paddle boards
  • Bicycle rentals
  • Kayaking
  • Dolphin watching
  • Dinner cruises
  • Snorkeling
  • Diving
  • Fishing
  • Boat rentals

Visit our area guide for more info on attractions and activities in Key West.
